wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[5 January|5]] - ''[[Roverandom]]'', edited by [[Christina Scull]] and [[Wayne G. Hammond]], is published in the UK.'''
==March==
* '''?''' -  Actor [[John Bryning]] dies.
==April==
* '''[[4 April|4]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 12 is published.
* '''[[15 April|15]] - ''[[Roverandom]]'', edited by [[Christina Scull]] and [[Wayne G. Hammond]], is published in the US.'''
* '''[[27 April|27]]''' - Actor [[Godfrey Kenton]] dies.
==June==
* '''[[3 June|3]]''' - Producer [[William Lawrence Snyder]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter]]'' issue 1 is published.

==July==
* '''[[15 July|15]]-[[20 July|20]]''' - [[Mythcon 29]].
* '''[[17 July|17]]''' - Author [[Paul H. Kocher]] dies.
* '''[[21 July|21]]''' - The Royal Mail published a new set of stamps, "Magical Worlds: Classic Fantasy Books for Children" with art by Peter Malone. One of the stamps features [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and [[Smaug]].
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 39]] is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'' issue [[Parma Eldalamberon 12|12]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[24 August|24]]''' - ''[[CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter]]'' issue 2 is published.
==September==
* '''[[7 September|7]]''' - [[Elfling]] is founded.
* '''[[25 September|25]]-[[27 September|27]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1998]].
* '''?''' - ''[[CarolinaCon Regional MECCG Newsletter]]'' issue 3 is published.
==October==
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - Actor [[Roddy McDowall]] dies.
* '''[[5 October|5]]''' - ''[[Tolkien: Man and Myth]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 October|17]]''' - [[Inklings|Inkling]] [[Colin Hardie]] dies.

==November==
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 36|''Mallorn'' 36]] is published.

==December==
* '''[[3 December|3]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 13 is published.
==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[An Awfully Big Adventure: J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' premieres.
* '''?''' - [[Audiobooks]] of ''[[Roverandom]]'' and ''[[Letters from Father Christmas]]'', read by [[Derek Jacobi]], are released.
* '''?''' - ''[[1998 Khandlendar compiled by Salman Rushtoes]]''
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle-earth Calendar 1998 (Finnish)]]''
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle-earth: The Balrog]]'' card game is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Christian Mythmakers|Christian Mythmakers: C.S. Lewis, Madeleine L'Engle, J.R.R. Tolkien, George MacDonald, G.K. Chesterton, & Others]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien Calendar 1999]] is released.
